titleStmt.title: [A] true account of what was done by a Church of Christ in Exon (whereof Mr. Lewis Stucley is pastor) the eighth day of March, 1657. when two members thereof were excommunicated. Together with the judgement of the non-conformists in the dayes of Q. Elizabeth, and K. Iames, concerning excommunication by a particular church. [Pu]blished by an eye abd ear-witness.
titleStmt.author: Mall, Thomas, b. 1629 or 30.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.W. for Matthew Keinton, at the Fountain in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
